description: On Order via UK group Kickstarter purchase...
Another fun filler game. This is one of my favorites, since we can usually convince anyone to stay a few more minutes and play a hand or two.
Another fun filler game. This is one of my favorites, since we can usually convince anyone to stay a few more minutes and play a hand or two.
Yes, it is good. I have played it enough and maybe it just doesn't quite sit with me well enough. Great game, just not up there for me.

title: Love this game
description: i really love this game. I dont especially like social deduction games but i do really enjoy some of the strategies that come out once you wrap your head around the abilities of the different cards. Even at 2 players which you wouldnt necessarily think would work for a social deduction game its still very fun and has some nice "Take That" elements .

title: I've playe...
description: I've played this several times now, I don't get it. So you can bluff different actions and you may or may not get called out on them, and in the end it comes down to counting what's left, and making a calculated risk on whether or not to call someone's bluff or rebluff a different role on your own.Much better with 5 or 6, I wouldn't play it with less, too many cards stuck in the middle.I'd play it, but only cuz it's super fast, I'm not going to ask for this to be played.

title: Played onc...
description: Played once, was allright. No need to buy this one though.

title: Started tr...
description: Started tracking games late. Add about 5 to the number of plays.

title: An amazing...
description: An amazing party game or filler game during a game night.  Even my non-gamer friends and family member love this game, which is why I will never get rid of it.  It has a low barrier to entry and is a quick play.  I love games like this.

title: It was the...
description: It was the Kickstarter edition with extras. Now it's much-needed space on my shelf because I never want to play this awful game again. I understand why some people might enjoy a game where all you do is lie and try to guess who else is lying but that's too much stress for me.

title: Very fun m...
description: Very fun micro party game about bluffing. Always up for it. New gamers will get frustrated because you have to remember what each role does in order to play successfully.

title: I'm amazed...
description: I'm amazed that I found a game that I hate more than The Resistance. This required me to raise my rating for The Resistance to 1.1
